import { Button, Navbar } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState } from "react"; function Menu() { const [selectedTag, setSelectedTag] = useState("All"); // Sample menu items for each tag const menuItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Item 1", price :"$6.99" ,discription:"this is 1st item",tag: "All" }, { id: 2, name: "Item 2", tag: "All" }, { id: 3, name: "Item 3", tag: "Breakfast" }, { id: 4, name: "Item 4", tag: "Breakfast" }, { id: 5, name: "Item 5", tag: "Lunch" }, { id: 6, name: "Item 6", tag: "Lunch" }, { id: 7, name: "Item 7", tag: "Shake" }, { id: 8, name: "Item 8", tag: "Dinner" }, { id: 9, name: "Item 8", tag: "Dinner" }, { id: 10, name: "Item 8", tag: "Dinner" }, ]; // Filter menu items based on the selected tag const filteredMenuItems = selectedTag === "All" ? menuItems : menuItems.filter((item) => item.tag === selectedTag); return ( <>

Our Menu

{filteredMenuItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.price}
{item.discription}

Tag: {item.tag}

))}
); } export default Menu;
